venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Enjoy a night of jazz, spoken word and networking with young professionals
and others who are committed to giving back to the Boston community. Learn
more about how Easter Seals is influencing the cause by helping to provide
children and adults with disabilities equal opportunities to live, learn,
work and play.

 

Featuring contemporary jazz by Elan Trotman, saxophonist and spoken word by Remon Jourdan.

 

Enter to win a Kinect & Xbox 360 bundle, Celtics and Bruins tickets and many others.  Raffle tickets: 1 for $5; 3 for $10.  All proceeds to benefit Easter Seals of Massachusetts.

 

Register today at http://connectforacause.eventbrite.com/ or by contacting Debbie Stevens at 800-244-2756 x315.  Or see event page on facebook.

 

On-site parking is available.  Microsoft is also a five-minute walk from the Kendall Square T Station.

 

$20 in advance, $25 at the door

(includes 2 free drink tickets, hors d’oeuvres and an exclusive gift bag).
item.name: Easter Seals Boston: Connect for a Cause!
